00023 void createOneTSPFile(char *filename, int order, const char *lsysfile, const char *lsname)
00024 {
00025     /* Compute the x-y coordinates of the instance represented by this L-System. */
00026     int numnodes = Lsystem(order, lsysfile, lsname, "plots");
00027 
00028     /* Now create a valid TSPlib file. */
00029     FILE *outfile_stream = fopen(filename, "w");
00030 
00031     /* Check that the file has sucessfully been opened */
00032     if (outfile_stream == NULL)
00033     {
00034         printf("ERROR: File '%s' could not be opened\n", filename);
00035         return;
00036     }
00037 
00038     /* Build the header file */
00039     fprintf(outfile_stream, "NAME: %s\n", lsname);
00040     fprintf(outfile_stream, "TYPE: TSP\n");
00041     fprintf(outfile_stream, "COMMENT: Created by Farhan Ahammed (farhan.ahammed@studentmail.newcastle.edu.au)\n");
00042     fprintf(outfile_stream, "DIMENSION: %d\n", numnodes);
00043     fprintf(outfile_stream, "EDGE_WEIGHT_TYPE: EUC_2D\n");
00044     fprintf(outfile_stream, "NODE_COORD_TYPE: TWOD_COORDS\n");
00045     fprintf(outfile_stream, "NODE_COORD_SECTION:\n");
00046 
00047     /* Add the coordinates of the points in this instance. */
00048     FILE *nodefile = fopen("plots", "r");
00049     char line[255];
00050     while(fgets(line, 255, nodefile) != NULL)
00051     {
00052         fprintf(outfile_stream, "%s", line);
00053     }
00054     fclose(nodefile);
00055     remove("plots");
00056 
00057     fprintf(outfile_stream, "EOF:\n");
00058 
00059     /* Close the file */
00060     int close_error_plot = fclose(outfile_stream);
00061     if (close_error_plot)
00062     {
00063         printf("ERROR: File '%s' could not be closed\n", filename);
00064     }
00065 }
00066

00077 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00078 {
00079     if (argc < 4)
00080         printf("usage:\n%s <L-System file> <L-System name> <order> <output file name>", argv[0]);
00081     else
00082         createOneTSPFile(argv[4], atoi(argv[3]), argv[1], argv[2]);
00083     return 0;
00084 }
